name: react-kavia
description: Lightweight React app with CI-stable startup; copy .env.example to .env to avoid exit code 137/OOM. Includes zero-bundle health endpoints.

scripts.//: Default start points to start:safe to keep CI stable and avoid OOM (exit 137). Use start:ultralowmem or ci:serve-static for extreme constraints.
scripts.prestart:ensure-env: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(!fs.existsSync('.env')&&fs.existsSync('.env.example')){fs.copyFileSync('.env.example','.env');console.log('[prestart] .env created from .env.example');} else { console.log('[prestart] .env present or .env.example missing'); }"
scripts.start:ci: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=256 node node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.start:safe: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=256 node node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.start:lowmem: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=256 node node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.start:ultralowmem: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=192 node node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.start:memcap: cross-env CI=true NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=256 npm run start:safe
scripts.ci:start:ultra: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=192 node node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
